ratings.question_text: Overall, how would you rate the workload of this course in comparison to other Yale courses you have taken?
What is your overall assessment of this course?
Do you expect to use this class for credit toward your major, or toward a pre-professional program?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize ECON 111 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend ECON 111 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: It's the senior thesis. Marc is an incredible resource, but be aware that it's really what you make of it! If you push yourself it'll hurt but you'll be really proud of what you accomplish......a feature film'

I would recommend this class if you're serious about learning how to write a screenplay, I can't overestimate how much I learned over the course of this year (and especially second semester) both about work ethic and screenplay mechanics, for that I owe Marc thanks, and what's really cool about this class is that right now I've got a screenplay I can show people, especially valuable because I'm about to head into the industry. If you're seriously thinking about taking this class, you probably should.
A thesis course for Film Studies majors in the screenwriting track. Small group workshop of writing for a full year.
